titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued on the subject of autism awareness.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued on the subject of autism awareness.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the Postal Service to issue, a commemorative postage stamp on the subject of autism awareness.
